alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Marshall; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wayne, southern Marshall, Lawrence and Giles Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lewisburg to Clifton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewisburg, Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Waynesboro, Loretto, Collinwood, Petersburg, Ardmore, Cornersville, St. Joseph, Elkton, Minor Hill, Ethridge, Lynnville, Cypress Inn, Lutts, Belfast, Goodspring, Leoma and Westpoint. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
